AlertRecordId.description: The record that's referenced by the insight alert.

AlertType.description: Specifies the type of insight alert.

CurrentDesignation.description: The current designation that's related to the job alert.

CurrentEmployer.description: The name of the current employer that's related to the job alert.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a record related to this alert record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this alert.

Name.description: The name of the alert record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the record.

PreviousDesignation.description: The previous designation that's related to the job alert.

PreviousEmployer.description: The name of the previous employer that's related to the job alert.
